name: Class DocTreePath
text:
A path of tree nodes, typically used to represent the sequence of ancestor
 nodes of a tree node up to the top level DocCommentTree node.
codes:
public class DocTreePath
extends Object
implements Iterable<DocTree>

methods.description:
Returns a documentation tree path for a tree node within a compilation unit,
 or null if the node is not found.

methods.method_sig:
public static DocTreePath getPath (DocTreePath path,
                                  DocTree target)
methods.description:
Returns a documentation tree path for a tree node within a subtree
 identified by a DocTreePath object, or null if the node is not found.
Returns the TreePath associated with this path.
Returns the DocCommentTree associated with this path.
Returns the leaf node for this path.
Returns the path for the enclosing node, or null if there is no enclosing node.
